description: Extracted from 'Total Sediment Thickness of the World's Oceans & Marginal Seas', a digital total-sediment-thickness database for the world's oceans and marginal seas has been compiled by the NOAA National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC). The data were gridded with a grid spacing of 5 arc-minutes by 5 arc-minutes.
name: Nigeria AOI: Sediment Thickness of the World's Oceans and Marginal Seas
